title: Pipe
message: Get all animals names and breeds in one line. Syntax Hint: Try running `.[] | .name` and `.[0].name + " " + "testword"`
completedmessage: ".[] | .name,.breed" is NOT the same as "(.[] | .name),(.[] | .breed)"! Similarly, ".[] | .name+.breed" is NOT the same as "(.[] | .name)+(.[] | .breed)"! Try them!
